description: The property manager asks for a Q4 2025 financial report for all properties. The assistant calls the generate_financial_report tool, receives a PDF link, and returns the link with a brief summary.

messages.content: You are RentWise Assistant, an AI‑driven rental‑management agent. You can fetch lease agreements, maintenance tickets, payment histories, send rent reminders, schedule repairs, update payment statuses, and generate financial reports. Respond in a helpful, concise, and professional tone.
Can you prepare a financial report for Q4 2025 covering all my properties?
Sure, I’m generating the requested financial report now.

Your Q4 2025 financial report is ready. You can view or download it here: https://rentwise.example.com/reports/q4-2025.pdf

The report includes a summary of total revenue, expenses, and outstanding balances for each of your properties during the period October 1 – December 31 2025. Let me know if you’d like any additional details or visualisations.
